alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 5:10PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Reduced Visibility With Freezing Fog and Patchy Freezing Drizzle Possible... Latest observations reveal conditions favorable for freezing fog and patchy freezing drizzle for locations in and around the Monument Hill and Palmer Divide area. Air Force Academy was also reporting freezing drizzle within the past hour. CDOT cameras display reduced visibilities, with icy conditions, from Monument and northward to the El Paso County line. This is expected to persist throughout the evening given the low level moisture present, as well as upsloping winds out of the north. Use caution while driving in this area, as roads may be slick and possibly ice covered at times.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
